name: BEAT SHOT
description:
(NOTE: Recommend Windows download for best visuals/performance)

Bring on the heat with boom box gun beats!

Make your way through the inside of an amp and reach the AUX-it (exit) to spread music to the masses. Time your shots to really feel the music and unleash powerful beat powered bullets!

CONTROLS
  • WASD = Move
  • L-Click =  Shoot
  • R-Click = Aim / Beat Shot
  • SPACEBAR  = Jump

TIPS
  • 4 shots timed to the beat will charge a single beat shot 
  • Aim to shoot a beat shot
  • Get funky

Made in 7 days for 7DFPS by @lyanggo and @jfret_digital
